sentence: We just returned from a Hong Kong Thailand and Bali trip which we saved for with another couple
Quite good actually good with family more down to earth not that luxuary u expected
We arrived with a group to Jimbaran Bay what an unbelievable experience for everyone
Fantastic holidays for me and all my family
Our aim of the trip was just to relax and we managed to do this the whole stay
All in all a great choice for a family getaway
His positive attitude and courteous behaviour while taking us on the long drives to Ubud made this trip extra special
We definitely will be willing and waiting to return and without any doubts can highly recommend the hotel to anyone searching for perfect getaway
We are planning as I sit in the villa now overlooking Jimbaran bay our next trip so we can stay here again

A vast array of water sport toys such as paddle boards kayaks and others are supplied by the hotel and the fact that these can be used safely should be welcoming and reassuring to families travelling with children
I was happened to stay at this resort due to family members party
A great place to simply relax or entertain a small group of people
We stayed at other FS properties Peninsula and Ritz Carlton in Asia before but this is one of the best vacations we ever had
This was our 2nd stop to a 9 day trip with my sister
My family stayed at Four Seasons Jimbaran for 6 nights and the whole experience has been nothing but perfect
It was our first mother daughter trip
We stayed in a garden villa as a family of 3
Tell everyone in the family to sit in front of the table bring some rice and coconut
I filed for trip insurance to cover but no luck
Or learn to cook Balinese style at the cooking school where you start your lesson with a trip to the food market at the other end of the bay
The beach area is never crowded but comes to life just before sunset at around 530 and is athrong with families dog walkers joggers and the likes
I would expect this is a standard hotel room not in a FAMILY villa
We had a family villa but of of our 2 kids did not have a proper bed
who want a holiday to bali contact me tour guide in bali whatsap

Unfortunately if you want to expose your family to the wonderful culture of Bali it is much harder these days with the traffic hordes of tourists and huge amounts of plastic pollution and debris everywhere
Restaurant recommendations trips to the Escape Rooms in Jimbaran for the kids you name it she was worth her weight in gold and adopted very quickly into our family
And if you are planning a trip to Bali then you could n’t go wrong with 3 nights in Sayan and 4 5 nights here
There was literally no requirement from our family of six that went unmet

Why stay hereThe Staff – amazing group of people that will make you feel so welcomedAmazing resort near airport that you never have to or will ever want to leaveService quality of dining and level comfort is exceptionalDry season surfing They will even helicopter you to G land for 12KCoking Classes Especially the kids ones50 M lap pool will captivate any swimmer in the familyGreat walking beach out frontDriving buggies around the property will make your Childs stayWhy not stay hereBeyond resort pricingLots of add on costs Small fitness center
This hotel should have been the highlight of our trip to a price of over 110 Euro per day but the room was worn down and was not at all the luxury we expect for that price we feel ripped off
Would definitely plan a trip back
Note there are a number of families here and this would be a great property for a family trip but we were also very easily able to find a peaceful adult escape
They brought paracetamol and extra water ginger tea and cakes to the room immediately and offered to make a trip to a local pharmacy to obtain some stronger painkillers which we gratefully accepted
In short if you develop a bad toothache while on vacation in Bali do it at the Four Seasons Jimaran Bay
You can also order a lunch for the little ones and they can eat at the kids center if parents are wanting an extra long break from the children
As a family of five with two young children 6yrs 10yrs and a teenager we felt part of the Bali family and safe
But on the whole really enjoyed our stay and will recommend and be back next year with friends and extended family
From the moment we arrived late Tuesday night after a long trip with a heavily pregnant wife to the time we left today the staff and that s what makes a place could not have been more impressive
We also took a day trip up to Ubud organized by the concierge
No fault of the hotel of course but if you want to go out and sight see be prepared for a day trip
